Text.Value: You were looking for a forge. What can you tell me about it?
Where can I find the forge?
What's this crystal I found on your body?
Why did you argue with Xargrim?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
How do I use this memory shard?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
What does this memory shard do?
What can you tell me about this forge?

Synopsis:
SwD with Dhourn (leader of the petrified Drow).
You can learn from this dialog about:
- Forge
- Memory Crystal and Activation Word for it;
- Xagrism (one of his frenemies)
